sense.gloss: best regards, please remember me, please treat me favorably (favourably), please take care of, please do
just like ..., as though one were ...

sdata.j: お↑父↑↓とう↓さんに|↑宜↑↓よろ↓しく|。
「じゃあ、チェックしちゃいますね」「↑審査|↑↓しんさ↓↑宜↑↓よろ↓しく|。↑頑張↑↓がんば↓ったつもりだぜ」
sdata.e: Right, I'll check your work, OK? "Please go ahead and inspect. I think I gave it a good go."

sdata.j: どうぞ|↑宜↑↓よろ↓しく|お↑願↑↓ねが↓い↑申↑↓もう↓し↑上↑↓あ↓げます。
sdata.e: Thank you very much for the consideration you will give to our request.

sdata.j: こんにちは、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑太郎↑↓たろう↓です。|↑宜↑↓よろ↓しく|お↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
sdata.e: Hello, I am Taro. Nice to meet you.

sdata.j: |↑宜↑↓よろ↓しく|お↑願↑↓ねが↓い↑致↑↓いた↓します。
sdata.e: Thank you very much for your cooperation.
